title: The Psychic Power of an Iconic Image
description:
Why I think the current situation in our country, with the protests and riots prompted by the death of George Floyd, is different from previous responses to similar acts against black Americans. Paul VanderKlay calls it "sacramental", and I add the element of iconography to the discussion. 

Paul VanderKlay, Should the Police Kneel and March with the Protesters? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h0GjV_f6520
